cab.content: S.EC R.-E/T'. - 244BATTLE SITUATION - EVSNBFCt - APRIL 20th 1918-Beyond small patrol encounters and artillery and aircraft activity no further infantry actions have taken place to-day and there is nothing of special in-terost to report-General Staff, - -War Office, S.W.I.20th April, 1913. ' Issued at 6 p .m*-
